text: Spencer Verbiest (born 6 February 1984) is a Belgian retired footballer who played as a defensive midfielder. ==Career== Verbiest previously played for K.A.A. Gent, SC Heerenveen and Antwerp. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian footballers Category:Belgian expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Royal Antwerp F.C. players Category:K.A.A. title: Spencer Verbiest
